metadata.name: Inertia #5
metadata.description:
These photographs capture a moment in my life when my dog experienced panic attacks, and I found myself unable to provide any assistance, feeling utterly helpless. I was grappling with these tensions, navigating through the aftermath of trauma, which can overpower our instincts and leave us paralyzed. The healing process, when it eventually starts, unfolds gradually and imperceptibly rather than swiftly.

I overexposed a 35mm film and painted on it with nail polish, scratched then scanned it.

Exposition: GipszJakab: Moralitas, Pestszentimrei Kozossegi Haz, Budapest, Hungary - 14 august 2020.

Year: 2020

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited.
